description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.Y6wJpc2ra3bSJ905]{Biotechnician}

Thanks to your enthusiasm for biotech gear and constant tinkering with your DNA, you can adopt experimental, cutting-edge augmentations in your body beyond what most people can support. You can install one additional piece of biotech augmentation than a typical member of your race. For example, a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.AMBcyDZDtJ1OOzh3]{Human} could have both a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.rkCYqOx384zfSVxW]{dragon gland} and a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.OFWiFfpq790ZNZjQ]{wildwise} implant (Starfinder Core Rulebook 211, 212) even though they both occupy the throat system.
